Html:
Hi,

Sorry if it was already responded, but I'm not able to find clearly this response :

Would prism v2 being integrated in the future .NET 4 ?

 

I heard that MEF should be integrated, wondering if it will be the same for Prism.

 

Thanks,

Christophe

Hi Christophe,

Prism will not be integrated in the .NET Framework 4.0.

I hope this information is useful.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
